response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in its utility and impact on your endeavors. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, aiming to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing my return. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
